articles.author: Alessandro Barbosa
articles.title: Street Fighter 6 Adds Denuvo Support Days Before Launch - GameSpot
articles.description: The controversial anti-tamper and anti-cheat software makes its way into another Capcom title.
articles.content:
Ahead of its anticipated launch on June 2, the Steam listing for the PC version of Street Fighter 6 has been updated to include a reference to Denuvo Anti-Tamper systems being included at launch.
Th… [+1794 chars]

articles.author: Jennifer Pattison Tuohy
articles.title: Amazon Echo Pop review: Alexa for less - The Verge
articles.description: At $40, the newest entry-level Echo smart speaker is cheaper, smaller, and comes in purple. It doesn’t sound as good as the Echo Dot, but it might find a good spot in your home.
articles.content:
As the latest entry-level Alexa smart speaker, the $40 Echo Pop packs a lot of value into a small package. Its not as good as the Echo Dot, but its got looks on its side. 
ByJennifer Pattison Tuohy,… [+10618 chars]

articles.title: System Shock through the ages: remake, Enhanced Edition and original visuals compared - Rock Paper Shotgun
articles.description: A quick System Shock remake vs original comparison to show you how Nightdive Studios updated the 1994 classic with (mostly) modern graphics.
